channel.title: Multi area and npc help!
channel.description: how can i make multi area? and how i maker npc hit more then 0 or 1

item.title: Multi area and npc help!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Nastay, post:2, topic:345942”]To answer question two.
Go into npc.cfg look for the NPC’s name/ID and you’ll see 2 different numbers to the rightside of the screen, now the number closer to the left is ‘Cmbat Level’ The number closer to the right is ‘NPC’s Hitpoints’ change both of them, compile and your NPC should hopefully be stronger, Hope I helped in some way[/quote]
Wrong, those only hold the data of what you just said.

@topic - I don’t know enough of this to tell you exactle, but look at other NPC’S inside of npchandler.java, you should be able to find something in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi area and npc help!
item.dc:creator: @Nastay Nastay
item.description:
@Nastay wrote:

To answer question two.
Go into npc.cfg look for the NPC’s name/ID and you’ll see 2 different numbers to the rightside of the screen, now the number closer to the left is ‘Cmbat Level’ The number closer to the right is ‘NPC’s Hitpoints’ change both of them, compile and your NPC should hopefully be stronger, Hope I helped in some way
